summary: THE VEHICLE IDENTIFICATION STICKER STATES THE WHEELS ARE 15' BUT THEY INSTALLED 16' WE COMPLAINED ABOUT IT AND THEY INSTALLED A LEAF SPRING LIFT KIT AND DID TOT CORRECT THE WHEEL SIZE. THIS WAS ALL RELATED A TIRE CLEARANCE ISSUE IF ANY MUD WAS ON THE TIRE IT WOULD RUB ON THE TOP OF THE WHEEL WELL .THE FIRST FIX AS NOTED WAS 04/20/2020  ON 02/27/2021 WHEN THE RV WAS SENT TO THE FACTORY FOR MORE REPAIRS I AGAIN TOLD THEM THE TIRE SIZE WAS NOT BEEN RESOLVED AND THEY AGREED TO ORDER THE 15' TIRES ON 03/29/2021 AND WE GET THE SAME ANSWER WHEN CALLING TO SEE IF THE NEW TIRES AND WHEELS ARE IN THEY SAY THERE IS A TIRE SHORTAGE.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2020 ECLIPSE ATTITUDE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE PASSENGER'S SIDE AXLE WAS LEAKING GREASE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE LOCAL DEALER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT INFORMED OF THE FAILURE.
